Header.title: The MBA Coach Hemant Tulsan
Header.paragraph: Elite Supplier Network in the US to kick start your D2C Business

About.us: Introducing the 'US D2C Starter Pack' – your ultimate resource for embarking on a successful journey in the world of Direct-to-Consumer (D2C) business. This comprehensive list of 300+ Manufacturers and Suppliers in North America opens the door to an extensive array of high-quality products, including cosmetics, packaged foods, and much more, all sourced from trusted suppliers who serve some of the world's best brands like Hugo boss, Nordstrom, North Face, Bvlgari, Porsche Design, Guess, Walmart, Gucci, Jcrew, Marriott etc.
About.vaev: At Vaev we want to empower aspiring entrepreneurs and established businesses alike by providing access to the very same suppliers trusted by renowned global brands. Whether you're looking to launch your own D2C venture or expand your product offerings, this invaluable resource is your key to success.
About.whyBuild: We have been working on a few tools for simplifying D2C. Our ultimate aim is to help people launch and run their D2C seamlessly. In the meantime, we thought we could put our research out in the open for aspiring entrepreneurs who are struggling to find the right suppliers for getting started.
forWhom: Aspiring Entrepreneurs: If you're looking to start your own direct-to-consumer business, this resource provides you with a valuable starting point to connect with reputable suppliers and manufacturers.
Existing D2C Brands: Established D2C brands seeking to diversify their product offerings or explore new suppliers can benefit from this list to expand their reach and offerings.
Small Businesses: Small businesses looking to streamline their supply chain and source high-quality products can find value in this resource.
Anyone Interested in D2C: Whether you're a marketing professional, consultant, or simply curious about the world of direct-to-consumer business, this list offers insights into the industry.
whatCanBeDone: Access a Curated List of Suppliers and discover trusted Suppliers
Explore New Product Opportunities and Launch your own D2C Business
Expand your Business while saving time and effort
why: To find the right us supplier for starting your own brand
To expand your existing product line
To find service companies to either get you started or help you grow your existing business

Team.name: Hemant
Team.job: Hemant is a second-year MBA student at IIM Kozhikode, focusing in the Marketing and Strategy domain. He holds a degree in B.Com from St. Xavier's College, Kolkata and is a fresher with 2 years gap. At IIM Kozhikode, Hemant was an elected junior member of Students' Placements Committee but left to pursue his other passion. He has also been a part of case competitions and was National finalist in the Amazon Ace case competition. He also interned at Pidilite in the Marketing domain for Fevicol division. In his free time he is passionate about content creation and watching films/series.

Team.name: Shubhangee
Team.job: Shubhangee is a second-year MBA student at IIM Kozhikode, focusing in the Operations and Strategy domain. She holds a degree in Mechanical Engineering from NIT Durgapur and has gained valuable professional experience working  at Tata Steel. At IIM Kozhikode, Shubhangee is an elected senior member of Omega, the institute's operations interest group. She has also been a part of case competitions and was National finalist in the Samsung Edge case competition. In her free time she is passionate about singing and travelling

Team.name: Sheetal
Team.job: Sheetal is a current second year student at Indian Institute of Foreign Trade, Delhi. She is currently majoring in Marketing and Strategy there. Having done her Business Economics from Gargi College, Delhi University, she has worked for startups like PharmEasy and Physics wallah in the HR domain. At IIFT, she is the Senior Cell Coordinator of Women in Development Cell, has been involved in various organising committees and actively taken part in case competitions. She is the National Finalist for Reliance -TUP and GS Women Possibilities Summit.

Features.title: Structured Writing Framework
Features.text: Master the art of writing with a comprehensive Written Ability Test framework and expertly crafted sample SOPs.

Features.title: Personalized Guidance
Features.text: Receive one-on-one attention and engaging knowledge sessions designed to boost your confidence and ensure success.

Features.title: Insider Interview Insights
Features.text: Gain valuable insights into what interviewers look for, helping you stand out and leave a lasting impression.

Features.title: GD & Mock PI Practice
Features.text: Participate in 5 Group Discussions and unlimited Mock Personal Interviews, with tailored sessions for specific colleges.
